mapper.update: update company_contract_template set template_name = #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_field = #{templateField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_file_url = #{templateFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_class = #{templateClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_file_path = #{templateFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select template_id, template_name, template_field, template_file_url, template_class, template_file_path from company_contract_template where template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select template_id, template_name, template_field, template_file_url, template_class, template_file_path from company_contract_template
